name: Crystal Pong
description:
My first game made with Superpowers, an awesome 3D HTML5 game maker for PC/Mac/Linux/Android/iOS/Web.

This was made for the Mini Ludum Dare with theme PONG.

Player controls the left pad with mouse or with touch, right pad is controlled by computer or with up and down arrows.

Click or tap the screen to launch a new ball.

Camera tilts in the direction of the player with lesser points.
